'''14w03b''' is the fifth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on January 16, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140122052947/https://mojang.com/2014/01/minecraft-snapshot-14w03a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w03b|date=January 16, 2014|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[14w03a]] snapshot.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=14w03b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|17156|{{cmd|give}} command throws <code>ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException</code> on high Item ID values.
|40420|MAJOR texture/rendering glitch.
|45254|Bold text is not correctly (right/center) aligned (invalid string length).
|;dev
|44533|Piston copies appear when pistons retract.
|44606|Door replacing block.
|44673|Duplication bug of doors using redstone torches.
|44702|Selector arguments not working in the expected location.
|44870|Name IDs don't work in most data tags.
|44886|Can't do {{cmd|spawnpoint}}.
|;prev
|44990|Iron bars, regular glass panes and cauldrons aren't transparent.
|44993|Custom player heads are messed up.
|45004|Placing flower pots crashes game.
|45014|Realms invited player skins are messed up.
|45018|Being killed makes the player's character lose their hat.
|45026|<code>Hopper: java.lang.NullPointerException: Rendering screen</code>.
|45032|Ender chest bug (using {{cmd|fill}}).
|45034|Graphical glitch in the sky
|45065|Game crashes when a player dies in the End and respawns at their bed.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 14w03b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
